responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can guide you to understand the background of Lorena, her projects, skills, hobbies and aspirations

Yes of course,I am Lorena GONGANG, a young graduate from Cameroon. I have a Master's degree in engineering with a major in Big Data for the digital transformation of the ESIGELEC school. I have two years of experience at Thales Alenia Space where I was an apprentice software developer. I am passionate about data, IT and finance. And I am therefore looking for a springboard in the world of data.

patterns: which programming languages do you master?
Which programming languages do you use?
responses: Throughout my professional and educational experience, I have had to develop skills in several programming languages: Python, R, Java, Javascript(d3.js), C#, HTML, CSS3, etc.
